participant_1.background:
I'm trying to figure out how to cope with my breakup.
it is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.
I keep the memory of my grandparents alive by telling stories about them to my children.
i see a therapist that does not really understand me.
i am a father.

participant_2.background:
I've kept my wife's terminal cancer a secret from my parents because I don't want them to worry.
I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days.
My cat is my most prized possession.
I take a deep breath and sing my favorite song in the shower.
i love to watch the voice.

content.text: Hey, I'm going through a rough breakup right now, can we talk about it?
Sure, I'm here for you. What's going on?
My girlfriend broke up with me and I'm having a hard time coping.
I'm so sorry to hear that. Breakups are tough, but you'll get through this.
Thanks, I appreciate it. I'm not sure how I'm going to tell my kids.
That's a tough one, but I'm sure you'll figure it out. Just remember that they're your kids and they love you no matter what.
Thanks, I think I'll tell them when I'm ready. In the meantime, I'm going to focus on myself and my healing.
That's a good idea. Take some time for yourself and do things that make you happy.
Thanks, I will. I really appreciate your support.
No problem, I'm always here for you.
